full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer: Responsive Maintenance Services
## Tender Information

### Title:

* English: W3719-24-WA01 Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Ottawa
* French: Services d'entretien Correctif - ALFC- Ottawa

### Solicitation Number:
WS4203683109

### Amendment Number:
4

### Publication Date:
02 November 2023

### Tender Closing Date:
19 December 2023, 14:00 EST

### Expected Contract Start Date:
01 April 2024

### Expected Contract End Date:
31 March 2026

### Contracting Authority:

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)

### Services Required:

The Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) requires cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio. The services include flooring, heating and ventilation, plumbing, landscaping, painting, electrical systems, carpentry, roofing, cleaning and janitorial services, and facilities management.

### Delivery Locations:

* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

### Trade Agreements:

* The tender is open to all bidders who are able to comply with the contract requirements.

### Contact Information:

* Gauthier, Martin (SPAC/PSPC)
* martingauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17900848?extsite=MTc5MDA4NDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Bid Requirements

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00 EST on 19 December 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

Optional teleconferences will be held for this tender. The exact times and details will be discussed further. Bidders are encouraged to confirm attendance by 14:00 EST on 8 November 2023. A person from the bidder's organization must confirm attendance in person.

# Important Dates and Deadlines

* 8 November 2023: Attendance confirmation deadline
* 14:00 EST, 19 December 2023: Tender closing date
* 01 April 2024: Expected contract start date
* 31 March 2026:
